title: Aarya Diamond Stud Earrings - Pushpakam డిజైన్
materials: 18K Yellow Gold base with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Gold Net Weight (N WT): 7.78g
Gross Weight (T WT): 7.98g. Diamonds are of VVS clarity and G color grade. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Features a floral "Pushpakam" (flower-like) design. The diamonds are pave-set to maximize brilliance and create a dazzling effect. Intricate filigree work on the gold enhances the overall delicate look. Modern aesthetic with a touch of traditional floral motif.
colors: creating a classic and elegant contrast.
occasions: Perfect for everyday elegance or special occasions like weddings
and festivals. Suitable for both traditional attire like sarees and modern outfits.
description: Crafted with exceptional attention to detail, these diamond studs offer a timeless design with superior sparkle. The high-quality diamonds and durable 18K gold ensure a lasting investment. The Pushpakam design symbolizes prosperity and beauty, making it a meaningful gift.
